Package model

Class Funcion

java.lang.Object
model.ElementoCine
model.Funcion
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class Funcion extends ElementoCine implements Serializable
Movie Show Class to create Funcion objects with its respective attributes.

This Class has 3 attributes: 

   - horarioElegido: It is an LocalTime object, represents a schedule time chosen by user

   - estreno: It is an boolean attribute, represents if a movie is a release

   - tipoFuncion: It is a TipoFuncion enum attribute, represents the Show Type
Since:
1.0
See Also:
